title: user_registration_with_role_validation
description: Test the user registration endpoint to ensure it accepts valid email, password, and role inputs, and successfully creates a user with the specified role.

title: user_login_with_valid_credentials
description: Verify that the login endpoint authenticates users with correct email and password, returning a successful login response and JWT token.

title: refresh_access_token_functionality
description: Test the token refresh endpoint to ensure it issues a new access token when provided with a valid refresh token.

title: user_logout_and_session_invalidation
description: Verify that the logout endpoint invalidates the user's session and tokens, preventing further access without re-authentication.

title: get_current_user_profile_with_authentication
description: Test the endpoint to retrieve the current authenticated user's profile, ensuring it returns correct user details when a valid token is provided.

title: create_new_job_posting_with_authorization
description: Verify that authorized users can create new job postings with valid data, and the system responds with a success status and job details.

title: apply_for_job_with_resume_upload_and_ai_screening
description: Test the job application endpoint to ensure candidates can submit applications with resume files, triggering AI-powered resume screening and returning a success response.

title: submit_leave_request_and_approval_workflow
description: Verify that employees can submit leave requests, and managers can approve or reject these requests, with correct state transitions and notifications.

title: send_chat_message_and_receive_ai_response
description: Test the conversational AI chat endpoint to ensure messages are processed with context and AI providers, returning appropriate AI-generated responses.

title: get_role_specific_dashboard_statistics
description: Verify that each user role can access their specific dashboard statistics endpoint and receive accurate real-time data and KPIs.
